nique Key. * No delete operation is performed, as the source system does not delete Additional Qualification records. ### Mapping |Model Attribute|Source Table|Source Field|Detail| |:----|:----|:----|:----| |extraInfo|**Additional Qualifications:** `XCREW.CRM_ADD_QUAL`|`REMARK`| | |crewId|**Qualifications:** `XCREW.QUALIFICATION`
**Additional Qualifications:** `XCREW.CRM_ADD_QUAL`|`TLC`| | |type| | |**Qualifications:** The field is set to "Qualification" in the query.
**Additional Qualifications:** The field is set to "Additional Qualification" in the query.| |subtype|**Qualifications:** `XCREW.QUALIFICATION`
**Additional Qualifications:** `XCREW.CRM_ADD_QUAL`|**Qualifications:** `type`
**Additional Qualifications:** `ADD_QUAL_CODE`|**Qualifications:** when `XCREW.QUALIFICATION.type` = “F“ then “Line” else “Transition/Supervision”
**Additional Qualifications:** `ADD_QUAL_CODE`| |aircraftType|**Qualifications:** `XCREW.QUALIFICATION`
**Additional Qualifications:** `XCREW.CRM_ADD_QUAL`|`ac_type_code`| | |aircraftCustomizedType| | |N/A in the source system.| |cat|**Qualifications:** `XCREW.QUALIFICATION`|**Qualifications:** `cat`| | |category|**Qualifications:** `XCREW.QUALIFICATION q`, `XCREW.RANK r`
**Additional Qualifications:** `XCREW.CRM_ADD_QUAL caq`, `XCREW.RANK r`|**Qualifications:** `q.RANK`, `r.RANK`
**Additional Qualifications:** `caq.RANK`, `r.RANK`|**Qualifications:**
  • when `q.RANK` = `r.RANK` and `r.RANK` <=4 then “Cockpit”
  • when `q.RANK` = `r.RANK` and `r.RANK` >4 and `r.RANK` <=8 then “Cabin” else “Other”

**Additional Qualifications:**
  • when `caq.RANK` = `r.RANK` and `r.RANK` <=4 then “Cockpit”
  • when `caq.RANK` = `r.RANK` and `r.RANK` >4 and `r.RANK` <=8 then “Cabin” else “Other”
| |level|**Qualifications:** `XCREW.QUALIFICATION q`, `XCREW.RANK r`
**Additional Qualifications:** `XCREW.CRM_AD
